data.text: Fuula Efreem, Beniyaamii fi Minaasee duratti
Yaa Waaqi, iddoo keenyatti nu deebisi;
Yaa Waaqayyo, Waaqa Waan Hunda Dandeessu,
Ati akka olloonni keenya nu tuffatan goote;
Yaa Waaqa Waan Hunda Dandeessu,  iddoo keenyatti nu deebisi;
Ati muka wayinii biyya Gibxii buqqiftee fidde;
Yoos ati maaliif akka namni achiin darbu hundinuu
Kormi booyyee bosona keessaa baʼee isa ni balleessa;
Yaa Waaqa Waan Hunda Dandeessu,  si kadhannaa gara keenyatti deebiʼi!
mukni kun muka wayinii kan harki kee mirgaa dhaabee dha;
Harki kee namicha karaa harka kee mirgaa jiru irra,
Yaa Waaqayyo, Waaqa Waan Hunda Dandeessu
